alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Greene; Indiana; Jefferson; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 9:44AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF HEAVIER SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT WASHINGTON...INDIANA... ALLEGHENY...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...WESTMORELAND...NORTHERN GREENE...SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...OHIO AND BROOKE COUNTIES... At 943 AM EST, a line of heavier snow showers was located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Punxsutawney to Murrysville to 8 miles southwest of Wolfdale. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph and visibilities dropping to 1 mile or less are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, Monroeville, McMurray, Greensburg, McKeesport, Indiana, Washington, and Jeannette. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 11 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 44 and 88. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 9 and 63. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 59 and 84. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Greene; Indiana; Jefferson; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
